content.p: The area of operation of a housing authority created for a county shall include all of the county for which it is created and the area of operation of a regional housing authority shall include (except as otherwise provided in to all of the counties for which such regional housing authority is created and established. But no county or regional housing authority shall undertake any housing within the boundaries of a city unless a resolution has been adopted by the governing body of the city (and also by any housing authority which has been created for that city pursuant to to or to declaring that there is a need for the county or regional housing authority to exercise its powers within that city.
